summary.span: 由窗体用于对其控件分页。

span.span: Used by a form to paginate its controls.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在分页，过程中对象传递到窗体上的每个控件和控件用于确定控件的页索引。During pagination, a object is passed to each control on the form, and is used by the control to determine the control's page index.

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选择的用于最佳页权重和控件权重的单位是灵活。The choice of units that you use for optimum page weight and control weights is flexible. 因为设备适配器可以提供两种类型的权重的适配器集能够权重单元的协调适当的约定。Because device adapters can provide both types of weights, a set of adapters can coordinate an appropriate convention for weight units. 但是，如果你按照默认单元系统时，你的适配器可以使用控件的默认权重。However, if you follow the default unit system, your adapters can use the default weights of controls. 默认单元系统基于一行 100 个单位，由常数。The default unit system is based on one line equaling 100 units, as indicated by the constant .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件在分页检索其分配的页以迭代方式调用此方法。Controls call this method iteratively during pagination to retrieve their assigned pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展类，请更改此字段和字段中，如果你需要使用某个值之外字段作为页面的默认权重。Extend the class and change this field and the field, if you need to use some value other than the field as the default weight for a page.
